rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn’t been chosen–
• Create a Clue token.
• Create a Food token.
• Create a Treasure token.
• Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
rules_text2:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Strange Stew: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Strange Stew, draw X cards, where X is half the number of differently named tokens you control, rounded down.
notes:
